text: The 2019–20 season was Shirak's 29th consecutive season in the Armenian Premier League. ==Season events== On 12 March 2020, the Football Federation of Armenia announced that all Armenian Premier League games had been postponed until 23 March due to the COVID-19 pandemic. ==Squad== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;
